name: Hospital 666
description:
You wake up in an endless hospital.
You can only use the front or rear elevator to escape.

Turn around if you see something strange.
Turn around if you see something strange.
Turn around if you see something strange.

What will you find on floor 666?

----------------------------------------------------

Hospital 666 is a horror game inspired by Exit 8, Escape the Backrooms, SCP Foundation and many horror movies.
You need to escape this abnormal hospital.
Choose the forward or backward elevator according to whether there is an abnormaly or not.
You will walk into different rooms and encounter different anomalies.
Some monsters may chasing you along the way, and you need to find a suitable way to escape from them.

Warning!!! This version of the game may crash.

----------------------------------------------------

Average Play time
666 minutes

Game content
More than 100 floors, 85 unique anomalies, and 5 bosses

Game Difficulty
Easy, Normal, and Hell modes

Game mode
Single player or 2-4 people online cooperation

Save function
Each floor will be automatically saved

Checkpoint
Some floors are checkpoints

Game engine
Unreal Engine 5.3

Control
Mouse and keyboard

Stab your friend in the back
Immoral but interesting

NFT
Does not exist

In-game purchases
Not so greedy

Error
Not mech

Typo
Not much

Real anomaly
Not ������
